title: Maintain constant vigil on financial sector, work to achieve inclusive growth: Finance minister to regula - Times of India
content:
1. Maintain constant vigil on financial sector, work to achieve inclusive growth: Finance minister to regula  Times of India
  2. FSDC calls for constant vigil on functioning of financial institutions  Economic Times
  3. Nirmala Sitharaman Asks Regulators To Maintain Vigil On Financial Sectors Amid Global Tensions  NDTV Profit

description: India Business News: MUMBAI: The high-level FSDC headed by finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Tuesday deliberated on the challenges emanating from global and domestic .
